title: Adoption
description: With Paw Share you will be able to get yourself a pet that needs you the most from someone near you! Nothing is off limits from dogs and cats to reptiles and fish

title: Sitting
description: If you are going away for a bit and need someone to look over your friend for you, don't fear! You can post a request on the app and wait for someone to apply, so that you can leave your pet and your worries in good hands!

title: Safety for all
description: We value safety so that the app can be perfect no matter who you are! From easy emergency contact on the go via QR code to your animal where you can leave helpful information about your animal for those who take care of it.
